titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Department of Economics, Yale University, Records
Department of Economics, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:42

did.unittitle: Department of Economics, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of reports, correspondence, minutes, and memoranda documenting faculty appointments, committees, budgets, and students in the Yale Department of Economics and the Economic Growth Center. Also included are grade books of Professor Fred R. Fairchild, 1904-1945.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 14-B (YRG 14-B), Records of academic programs and departments of the Yale Faculty of Arts and Sciences.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of Economics, Yale University, Records (RU 422). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of reports, correspondence, minutes, and memoranda documenting faculty appointments, committees, budgets, and students in the Yale Department of Economics and the Economic Growth Center. Also included are grade books of Professor Fred R. Fairchild, 1904-1945.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

Jones, Frederick S, Dean, Yale College
